## Evaluation Process

### Setup
```bash
# Installation
uv run pip install opendxa

# Configuration
export DXA_FEATURE_SETTING1=value1
export DXA_FEATURE_SETTING2=value2

# Verification
uv run python -m dana.[module].verify
```
